general.gigTitle: design and redesign responsive wordpress website development for business by 24h

sellerCard.description:
I'm a professional UI/UX, Web & Graphic Designer. I have trained almost 21000+ students in this sector. 

I have a big team of 45 members working continuously for our customers from countries like the USA, Canada, UK, Australia, Israel, Poland, Africa, Europe, etc.

I've more than 7+ years of solid Experience on: 
◼ Web & Mobile PSD Layout 
◼ Landing Page 
◼ Full Branding - Design & Development 
◼ User Interface Design 
◼ User Experience Design 
◼ Adobe Photoshop 
◼ Adobe Illustrator 
◼ Responsive Web design 
◼ UI/UX - Unique Wireframes 
◼ PSD to HTML & Bootstrap 
◼ WordPress

description.content:
design, redesign, and develop topnotch websites using wordpress, shopify, wix

---------

You will get the below features from me which will be included in my all the packages:


Professional & and awesome design.

Clean, smooth, and better output.

Creative and unique design.

High-quality work with better revision.

Super fast and active delivery.

Included JPG, PNG & Mockups

If you need other things please use an extra or another package.

Lifetime Inbox Support


Until my clients are satisfied, I will provide my good support & and services. 


If you have a project that needs some creative injection then that's where I come in! 

I am always accepting new clients, collaboration, or anything else! 


 Tools I use:

--------------------

WordPress, Shopify, WIX, Figma & Web Flow etc


Thanks once again for viewing my gig!


https://www.fiverr.com/rifatmhuq100/

openGraph.title: design and redesign responsive wordpress website development for business by 24h

reviews.comment: I would like to say that I am not one to give out feedback unless something really annoys me or something impresses me, and I’m glad to say that Rifat and his team have been absolutely brilliant. My previous website designer let me down and now I am thankful for it, because it would not have forced me to look for another team. Rifat’s speed, creativity and expertise, and his character, are a wonderful combination that won’t let you down. I’ll be back to work with him again

I greatly enjoyed working with Rafit on this project, he was quick to respond to any messages that I sent out while he was online and active. I also think that the mockups presented at the end of the service were very nice.

seller_response.comment: One of the best client I have ever had!

reviews.comment: Rifat M Huq truly shines in website design! His professionalism and attention to detail perfectly aligned with our brand, creating stunning results. Not only did he deliver on time, but his deep understanding and dedication went ABOVE AND BEYOND our expectations. 🙌

seller_response.comment: One of the best client I have ever had. Looking forward to more work In future.

reviews.comment: Fixed up my website very quickly!
Brilliant work, exceptional team, very good management, and very detail  oriented. creatively outstanding

seller_response.comment: One of the best buyer in FIVERR!! He is just too much honest about his work and deadlines. Really grateful to get this buyer in my Fiverr journey.

reviews_snippet.comment: I would like to say that I am not one to give out feedback unless something really annoys me or something impresses me, and I’m glad to say that Rifat and his team have been absolutely brilliant. My previous website designer let me down and now I am thankful for it, because it would not have forced me to look for another team. Rifat’s speed, creativity and expertise, and his character, are a wonderful combination that won’t let you down. I’ll be back to work with him again

I greatly enjoyed working with Rafit on this project, he was quick to respond to any messages that I sent out while he was online and active. I also think that the mockups presented at the end of the service were very nice.

Rifat M Huq truly shines in website design! His professionalism and attention to detail perfectly aligned with our brand, creating stunning results. Not only did he deliver on time, but his deep understanding and dedication went ABOVE AND BEYOND our expectations. 🙌
